definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: He raised the child up in order to let him reach the branch.
sentences.chinese: 他将孩子举高以便让他够得着树枝。

sentences.english: The bell is within my reach.
The shabby red piano seat is long enough for two people to sit side by side.
sentences.chinese: 破旧的红色琴凳够得着两人并排而坐。

sentences.english: When it was finally within reach he caught hold of it and tossed it up onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 当最终够得着时他抓住它，向上抛到路上。

sentences.english: Bob is so tall that he can almost reach the ceiling .
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃个子那么高，他几乎够得着天花板。

sentences.english: Put the dictionary within my reach.
sentences.chinese: 请把辞典放在我够得着的地方。

sentences.english: Don't leave matches or cigarettes on the table within the reach of little children.
sentences.chinese: 不要把火柴或香烟放在桌子上孩子们够得着的地方。

sentences.english: Old Mrs. Pursey kept her cane within reach.
sentences.chinese: 珀西老太太把她的手杖放在身旁够得着的地方。

sentences.english: The initial posterior bone work is done using rongeur to remove the process spinous and any accessible bone fragments.
sentences.chinese: 手术开始阶段使用咬骨钳咬出棘突和够得着的骨片。

sentences.english: Luckily, it was just in his reach.
Can you reach the light switch from where you are sitting?
sentences.chinese: 从你坐的地方够得着灯的开关吗？

definition: to hook onto/to hitch onto/to catch onto
to catch (sth thrown etc)/to receive (sth given)/to accept
to move (sth) aside/to step aside/to move over (when sitting on a bench)/to shift (one's gaze)
a support/to raise/to bolster/to jack up
